HTMLFormElementAutocomplete.summary: The autocomplete property of the interface indicates whether the value of the form's controls can be automatically completed by the browser. It reflects the {{htmlelement("form")}} element's autocomplete attribute.

remarks.para:
-form
-HTML autocomplete attribute
-ARIA aria-autocomplete attribute
-Turning off autocompletion

HTMLFormElementAutocomplete.value: A string; the value "off" if explicitly set to "off", and otherwise always "on".
